name: Samurai Assassin Hero 3 Egypt
description:
This is the third journey of ninja samurai. For this game, he visited Egypt. This epic fun game contains 10 levels. In this violent 3D action game you fullfill your goal of life. The aim is to collect all stars and climb where is the target showing on your compas to finish a mission.

You are armed with lethal sword blade ( katana ), shurikens and bow. Feel sense of archery and strike at the right moment.
Develop this skill as a player and shoot a magic arrow through more than 2 enemies at once.
Shurinkens are mighty arm, they can bounce from walls to hit multiple targets.

You can also pick stealth approach and use your infiltration, sneak, spy skills.
Swim,climb and discover secret entrances. Use underground tunnels,climb on a bridge and try to be invisible as a real ninja warrior of shadow.

In this game, you will plunder multiple tombs and collect secret treasuries. You will steal all loot from pyraminds. Unaware from your mercenary enemies you can finish the level like a japanese rising shadow hunter without of need to gear up and crime combat. Collect magic arrows to make your mission easier to eliminate anything in your way.

Mortal warriors and mummies will try to crush you with their strong tiger armor and hammer. Every enemy has different abilities.
You will have to chop, kick, punch, slash through them like a hitman or just climb away to disappear.
Your hero has through learning of kung fu, martial arts, fighting skills, climbing from your evil sensei.


- Realistic stealth and combat movements
- Action moments filled with litres of blood
- wonderful background music
- Realistic HD graphics
- Environment of anciant Egypt
